title: Linux Pre Patching Validation Common Variables

patch_type.title: Patch Type
patch_type.description: The type of patches need to be applied.

jumphost_path.title: Jumphost path to save config backup
jumphost_path.description: Path on the jumphost server where configuration backup would be saved.

filesystems_to_check.title: Filesystems to be checked for free space
filesystems_to_check.description: Filesystems (other than /var and /boot) need to be checked for required free space. The FS list should be in an array format.

boot_space_threshold_mb.title: /boot space threshold in MBs
boot_space_threshold_mb.description: Available space threshold for /boot file system in MBs.

other_fs_space_threshold_perc.title: Other FS space threshold
other_fs_space_threshold_perc.description: Available space threshold percentage for filesystems other than /var and /boot.

fail_on_error.title: Fail the execution if error occurs?
fail_on_error.description: Switch to decide whether execution should fail in case of unsuccessful patching.

skip_cluster_check.title: Skip Cluster Check?
skip_cluster_check.description: Switch to decide whether cluster check needs to be skipped so that nodes part of OS cluster can be patched as well.

system_load_check.title: System Load Check?
system_load_check.description: Switch to decide whether memory and cpu usage on the end server need to be checked before patching.

teams_notification.title: Teams Notification Required?
teams_notification.description: Switch to decide whether MS Teams notification is required.

channel_webhook_url.title: Channel Webhook url
channel_webhook_url.description: MS Teams channel webhook url to receive notifications.

send_email.title: Email Notification Required?
send_email.description: Switch to decide whether email notification is required.

recipients.title: List of email recipients
recipients.description: List of email recipients in array format.

attach_config_data.title: Attach config data to email?
attach_config_data.description: Switch to decide whether pre and post patching config files need to be attached to the consolidated email.

sfs_upload.title: Upload results to SFS?
sfs_upload.description: Switch to decide whether patching results need to be uploaded to SFS.

service_restart_list.title: OS services to be restarted
service_restart_list.description: Comma separated list of OS services which need to be stopped before patching and started after successful patching.

app_service_stop_script.title: Script to stop application services
app_service_stop_script.description: Absolute path to the script to stop application services before patching.
